abstract: New shows from Louis C.K., Sacha Baron Cohen, Diablo Cody, Tig Notaro and Shane Black will be included in a slate of pilots that will debut on Amazon later this fall.

headline.main: Amazon Announces New Pilots From Louis C.K., Tig Notaro and Sacha Baron Cohen

snippet: New shows from Louis C.K., Sacha Baron Cohen, Diablo Cody, Tig Notaro and Shane Black will be included in a slate of pilots that will debut on Amazon later this fall.
